mapper.select: SELECT b.*, count(a.scrap_id) as scrap_count FROM SCRAP a RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT board_id, member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_nickname, board_hit, board_like, board_comment_count, bgroup_id FROM board WHERE BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{search}||'%' or BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{search}||'%' or BOARD_NICKNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%') b ON a.board_id = b.board_id GROUP BY b.board_id, b.member_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_nickname, b.board_hit, b.board_like, b.board_comment_count, b.bgroup_id ORDER BY ${category} DESC
